description: Steven Lee has been trying to get a date with the tall and handsome Jack Hunter for a year, and he's final worn him down. Tragically, Steven chokes to death on a piece of gum before he can make good on their plan. Steven isn't going to let a little thing like complete obstruction of the airway stop him from getting his thick cock deep inside of Jack, though. When the spirit handling Steven's transition into the afterlife hears that he has a dick appointment waiting for him, he sends him back planet-side immediately so that he can cross pounding Jack's tight ass bareback off of his bucket list.
title: Second Chance: Bareback
